News.headline: TONIGHT: The National League v The British Army
News.page_title: TONIGHT: The National League v The British Army
News.URL_keywords: TONIGHT: The National League v The British Army
News.short_description: In a unique series of representative matches, The National League will play The British Army at three differing locations this evening.
News.description:
The three games tonight at Eastbourne Borough, Harrogate Town and Tamworth all kicking off at 7:45pm. Each match being supported in partnership with Vanarama and S & C Slatter.

Each of the three squads are drawn from players who play in The National League North and South ONLY.

We have much pleasure in announcing the respective squads and the Manager of each.

Please see attached plus our programme image cover for all three matches.

We wish them all the best and look forward to each match being well attended. Entry is £5 for Adults (including a programme) with Seniors & Juniors FREE. Extra programmes are £2.
